explanation: [0-0] The image shows a stainless steel refrigerator with two long bar-shaped handles on the door. Next to the refrigerator is a white door with a painting hanging on the wall beside it. The painting depicts a baby wearing pink clothes. The floor is light-colored wood, and the walls are light gray. Half of a person's body is visible on the left side of the frame.
[0-2] Then, a man wearing a blue T-shirt and dark shorts walks closer to the refrigerator from the left side of the frame, opens the refrigerator door, revealing various condiments and drinks inside.

[2-4] The man then takes something out of the refrigerator and closes the door. A woman wearing a Morty mask jumps out from behind the refrigerator door, startling the man, who runs out of the frame.
